Project.Brief history of your project and organi: OmniObject3D is a large-vocabulary 3D object dataset containing a large number of high-quality real scanned 3D objects, aiming to promote the development of 3D perception, reconstruction and generation techniques in the real world. Each object is captured by 2D and 3D sensors, providing texture meshes, point clouds, multi-view rendered images, and multiple surround live-action videos.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: OmniObject3D is a large-vocabulary 3D object dataset containing a large number of high-quality real scanned 3D objects, aiming to promote the development of 3D perception, reconstruction and generation techniques in the real world. Each object is captured by 2D and 3D sensors, providing texture meshes, point clouds, multi-view rendered images, and multiple surround live-action videos.
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Greater China, Asia other than Greater China, North America, Antarctica
Project.How will you be distributing your data t: Cloud storage (i.e. S3), HTTP or FTP server, Shipping hard drives
